lead_paragraph: SITNICK--Linda. The Board of Trustees and staff of Educational Alliance mourn the passing of Linda Sitnick, a longtime supporter of our work, 14th Street Y member, and wife of Trustee Irving Sitnick. We offer our sincere condolences to Irving and his family. Erica Tishman, Chairman of the Board; Alan van Capelle, President and CEO 1/3
